title: Narritjin at Djarrakpi. Part 2 (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
description: Episode of Series "Narritjin Maymuru (A)". This program continues the life of Narritjin and his family at his clan settlement at Djarrakpi. Throughout Narritjin tells of his feelings about Djarrakpi and of his hopes for the future. A continuation of the study of the life of Narritjin and his family at his clan settlement at Djarrakpi, where they live largely off the land and the sea, producing bark paintings and craftwork to sell at Yirrkala. Gives an insight into Narritjin's family life and his role as an educator to his sons.
